ca7abe91-177d-48b3-b80b-f909af248c5b.Bio: Nandita Surwar, an ambitious soul hailing from Nagpur, Maharashtra. Having recently completed my 12th grade, I embarked on a transformative journey at Navgurukul Amravati Campus, where I spent eight months as a student. Determined to achieve self-independence and facing financial constraints at home, Navgurukul extended a helping hand, nurturing my dreams. I aspire to make my parents beam with pride, showcasing the epitome of their daughter's potential.
ca7abe91-177d-48b3-b80b-f909af248c5b.Name: Nandita

9b366d92-149c-49ca-b130-e4fdb353cf28.Bio:
Sudhanshu hails from Siwan, Bihar, where he completed his early education within his village's bounds. During his JEE preparation journey, he discerned critical gaps in learning experiences, compelling him to pledge substantial changes in India's student education landscape. After graduating from Tezpur University, Assam, with an engineering degree, Sudhanshu departed from his corporate career to embrace the Gandhi Fellowship. This immersive experience delved into India's public education system, shaping his convictions further.
Post his fellowship tenure, Sudhanshu collaborated with the visionaries behind two fledgling education startups. His efforts were pivotal in sculpting their offerings for schools and communities, amplifying their impact. Working closely with students and parents in distant tribal hamlets, he encountered a pivotal challenge—conveying concrete post-program livelihood prospects to graduates. This hurdle catalyzed a profound pause, during which Sudhanshu wholeheartedly dedicated himself to fostering enhanced livelihood avenues.
With a sharp focus on bolstering livelihood opportunities, Sudhanshu endeavours to tackle the root causes of their adversities. His purpose centres on empowering families with sustainable income sources and resources, enabling a transformative shift from their present circumstances. His core belief lies in furnishing these families with the means to uplift their quality of life. By forging this path, Sudhanshu seeks not only to elevate individual lives but also to cascade positive transformations across entire communities. His unwavering commitment is an embodiment of his aspiration to contribute to holistic community well-being.
